website_summaries.verdict: Simple, portable, and comfortable. This is the perfect choice when you're looking for an air mattress rather than a substitute for a piece of furniture.
pros: Doesn't take up as much room as a tall bed
Great for indoor or outdoor use
Rarely need to add more air
Soft flocked top provides a luxurious sleeping surface
Battery-powered pump (takes six C-size batteries, not included).600-pound weight capacity

customer_reviews.title: Good price decent air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This bed had instructions that say that the mattress will need to be slept on and reinflated about 3 nights before it is fully broken in because the material will stretch slightly! I didn’t realize this at first (reading all the instructions really comes in handy) After 3 nights it seems to hold air and is comfortable. I’d give it 4 stars so far but cause of the price and how it works sleeping on a floor. I don’t know how durable it is yet because I’ve only used it on a hardwood floor and I will be using it for camping in a tent.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress. Bad pump.
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself is fine, but the pump is pretty bad. It will not have the power to inflate the bed firmly and the latch holding the batteries is not strong enough. If you have an alternative to blowing it up (plug in works best) this will do fine, if not, expect sub par results from the supplies pump. The thinner mattresses, I find to be better for multiple people. We have large one (twice the height), but if the people aren’t of equal weight, the heavier will have the other person on top of them. The thinner mattress doesn’t cause this to such a great extent.
customer_reviews.author: AntneeLINY

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, and great price
customer_reviews.text: The Intex Prestige Downy Airbed met and exceeded my expectations. Thanks to previous reviewers, I wasn't worried when the matress seemed to lose air at first. After giving the airbed time to stretch, that no longer happens. Also, a tiny dog with very sharp claws sleeps on it. I was concerned about her puncturing it, but no problems at all. Comfortable, and great price!
customer_reviews.author: pat abernethy

customer_reviews.title: Good camping mattress
customer_reviews.text: We use this when car camping. It has worked great for the past several years. We've had other mattresses that have not worked out so well. This is big enough to be comfortable in our tent and keeps us off the cold ground. The pump takes 4 D-cell batteries and is somewhat loud but you don't have to use it very long.
customer_reviews.author: photoguy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, reliable, and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and works well - I have notice it deflates slowly through the night but nothing major, simply not as stiff in the morning after sleeping on it. (Have used multiple times, was not due to material stretching) but this is something you can expect from any air mattress. Definitely would reccomend, it is pretty durable and has not failed me yet after using it for probably 20+ nights. The air pump that came with it works great. It's been inflated 3 separate times on the same set of batteries. Honestly I'd give this product 6 stars if I could. Definitely got my moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain
customer_reviews.text: Inflates quickly and easily (with 6 "C" cells not included(. Used a couple nights already in the tent with a boucing 40 lb toddler and Daddy onboard and no leaks! Not crazy comfortable but wasn't expecting that in this price range (it's not a pillow top) and bought primarily for camping. Vinyl it thick and seems to be durable (so far).
customer_reviews.author: DLee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: As I’m camping right now, I would rate this less than 1 star if I could. The mattress will NOT stay inflated. While sleeping I woke up to a completely deflated mattress. Today, I’ve filled it several times and it keeps loosing air without anyone even laying on it. It seems the air is leaking slowly out of the valve and I’ve disconnected/connected it several times with no resolution. So tonight should be fun :( **Update - The valve is defective. If you remove the large valve to deflate the air mattress or to quickly inflate it, once you put it back on then the valve never seals properly again and the air leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress did not hold air, even after following the manufacturers directions explicitly. Could find no visible leaks. In addition, there was no pump in the box. Rip off. Also, no returns. Will contact the seller and see if can refund me as I don't want to go through this again. This was purchased for a weekend of camping and so needless to say, it was an uncomfortable two nights of sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: does not come with batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and easy set up, very quick too! Only negative thing was it did not come with the 6 C batteries you need for the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress is terrible. We tried to use it on a camping trip and ended up sleeping on the ground for a week because it would not hold air. We had even prefilled it to try to let it stretch prior to our trip as suggested but it just continuously leaked air and we couldn’t find a hole to patch. And now that we were out trying to use just this past week we’ve missed the return window. Waste of money. I wish I could give zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Chambers pop open or mattress leaks significantly straight out of box
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this multiple times. First one lasted about a month of regular use until one of the chambers popped open but it still worked for another month or so, which seemed pretty good, so I got another one. The one I just purchased deflates in 2-3 hours. At first I thought it was just stretching out, like air mattresses do in the first day or so, but after a couple of fills, I've determined that, no, it's just already leaking that much straight out of the box. Extremely disappointed with what I thought was a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, worth it just for the pump.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mattress. Not sure what the other reviews are talking about with the bad valve, mine is completely fine. Bonus: The pump is separate from the mattress and has multiple nozzle attachments so you can use it for more than just this. I used the pump to fill my pool floats. It's worth the purchase just for the pump!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: it's silly to have to puy in a headline, but...
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice and comfortable mattress, It holds it's pressure well and is easy to take care of. save the box it comes in for storage purposes unless you have something better. Use the pump to completely deflate the matress, that way it will fold up really well. I like the product and wouldn't hesitate to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: ned j. augustyniak

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Two stars for the two times it was useable. Used it for van camping and it fit perfectly and was comfortable but only got to use it twice before it developed a slow leak I can’t find. Had to reinflate it twice during the night and was sleeping on the ground in the morning. Hard to find a good, sturdy, air mattress in full size that’s single height. They’re either cheaply made or double height, not intended for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Margo Freibott

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product, badly made.
customer_reviews.text: mfr defect - inner chamber divider detached causing half of the mattress to bubble up like a giant muffin top. rendering the whole thing useless. But it happened outside the "return window" so it seems I am just screwed. Wish I payed $6 higher amount for the nearly identical one at Target. They would have taken it back in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: MixiePixie

customer_reviews.title: Airy
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well made. As described. It fit inflated in the back of a 2018 Jeep Grand Cherokee with the back seats laid down.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Wax

customer_reviews.title: Used every weekend so far
customer_reviews.text: I have guests over every weekend and it usually gets too late for them to head home so I pull this out as a more comfortable option as apposed to a couch. I've been using it for 2 months now and I must say I love how fast it is to inflate and how durable it is. I have not been the kindest to it yet with every table corner it stays fully inflated. The first week I had this product, it seemed to be a become a bit deflated but after using it twice it stretched in and now holds all the air I put in it. Even over two nights.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Winden

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend. This past weekend was his first chance to use the mattress camping. It deflated the first night he used it - was defective from the get go. Because I purchased it several months ago, it cannot be returned. I wouldn't waste my money on buying this product, but if you do, make sure you inflate it when you receive it to make sure it doesn't leak. Very disappointing. As a follow up, I emailed the company about their faulty product and heard nothing back. Poor customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best nights sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I have back pain when trying to sleep on regular mattress. I put this on top of my mattress since its only 8" high it doesnt make my bed too tall. I haven't had any trouble sleeping since i started using it. For awhile it was impossible to find the full size. Only twin and queen were available at every place i tried. So i bought 2 when i found them here.
customer_reviews.author: shirley glahn

customer_reviews.title: Returned it. It took over an hour to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. It took over an hour to get half way blown up with what it comes with. Then by the time we woke up, we were basically on the ground!
customer_reviews.author: Saydee James

customer_reviews.title: HAVE HAD BAD EXPERIENCES WITH INFLATABLES IN THE PAST BUT THIS ONE ...
customer_reviews.text: SUPPORTS EVERY BIT OF 500 LBS WITHOUT LEAKAGE. HAS REMAINED IN THE FIELD AND INFLATED FOR MONTHS NOW. REQUIRES LITTLE TO NO MAINTENANCE. PUMP IS EFFECTIVE AND QUICK ABOUT INFLATION/DEFLATION. HAVE HAD BAD EXPERIENCES WITH INFLATABLES IN THE PAST BUT THIS ONE IS SLOWLY CHANGING MY OPINION. WOULD RECOMMEND FOR STATIC CAMPING WHERE IT NEED NOT BE MAN-PACKED AND TRANSPORTED.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, rips quick for no reason
customer_reviews.text: Pretty quick to inflate, but that’s the only good thing. As far as comfort, it’s an air mattress. Pretty standard. What is infuriating is the thing has been used twice since purchased, not even for camping, but as an extra bed at my parents. Go to use it again, and it has a tear in the lining, so it can’t hold air. This is the second one of these to do that. The first one lasted about a year, and I thought we had accidentally knicked it. But now I realize it’s the bed itself. It’s not durable. Absolutely infuriating.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kreipe

customer_reviews.title: Realiable and cheap
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has been through it and is still kickin. Great buy. So cheap. Why spend more money when you don’t need to? Works great for camping and also when you need an extra crash space.
customer_reviews.author: MeghanShops

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this product! It deflated all four times I tried, but sometimes the product needs to be filled up several times before it will hold air, so I kept trying. By the5th time I used it it still wouldn’t hold air and again I woke up with it being completely deflated. Couldn’t figure out how to contact customer service so I ended up just throwing it away. It was a complete WASTE of money and I’ll necer buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great airbed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for camping. It inflates fast when using a pump to hook up to car. Mattress stays pretty firm overnight. I sometimes had to give it a quick top-off with a hand pump before bed the next day. Well worth the money. It packs up back into the box if you fold it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: The battery operated pump is a great add on. The mattress is good and soft. I don't give a 5 star because it loose a little the air. We have to fill it up before bedtime on a daily base
customer_reviews.author: Yiya

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like what we needed for an extended camping trip. The battery-powered pump appeared flimsy but it did it's job. I inflated the bed before departure and it seemed fine. However, once we slept on it, we discovered that it slowly leaks so that what started as a comfortable night's sleep ended with us on the hard ground. Every night. We had to return the bed for a refund. Maybe we should use the refund on a chiropractor.
customer_reviews.author: Matt O'Mansky

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. High quality, thick plastic. Pump did just fine for being battery powered. Took mine camping and it held air all weekend.
customer_reviews.author: FNA

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress worked really well. Used it for a sleep over at my house. 2 full size women slept on this and it did not deflate like some reviews said. The batteries to the pump were a little expensive but once we figured out how it works it was great and had the mattress nice and full. They also said it was pretty comfortable to sleep on. Overall I would recommend this air mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inovative idea for camping. The little compact pump is ...
customer_reviews.text: Inovative idea for camping. The little compact pump is very handy. But this bed goes flat within a hour of airing it up. I can not find a hole in it. I'm guessing the seal for the air pump doesnt fully seal.
customer_reviews.author: Er H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good air mattress for the money. I keep this in a spare room and frequently have people crash on it after a late night. It has held up well and just needs a little supplementary air every few weeks. The pump works perfectly and is quick to inflate the mattress. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Zach B.

customer_reviews.title: Priced for one time use.
customer_reviews.text: The pump requires c batteries and has no plug. And after we went out to buy the batteries, it started to deflate after 1 week of use.
customer_reviews.author: CLB

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was our extra bed while we traveled for a family vacation - by the end of the trip it was the favorite bed to sleep on! Easy to inflate/deflate and very comfortable. Standard sheets fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and does not stay inflated through out the night.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the second time on a 2 night camping trip this weekend. Both mornings my body was caved into the mattress and was touching the ground. Mattress does not stay inflated.
customer_reviews.author: b00kwheat

customer_reviews.title: Defective product...Intex will not replace it
customer_reviews.text: We bought the airbed to be used by our college daughter when she would be home for a few weeks. It was only used a couple weeks when it developed a huge column lump. When I called Intex, I was told it was defective but they would not replace it and Amazon said I only could get a refund or replacement through Intex. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a temporary bed in our cabin while we were finishing it out. It has been inflated for over a month and still sleeps great and have only had to add a little bit of air one time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bowser

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Would Recommend. Give it a shot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it seemed like an easy and cheap way to get an inflator and a mattress for camping. After reading some of the reviews I was skeptical, but bought it anyway. It worked the first night, and stayed inflated all night (my boyfriend and I combined are about 500lbs)! I love that the air valve allows are to go in but doesn’t allow air to come out when you are blowing it up! This was actually way better than I expected and I’m really happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela DeLuca

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for camping trip
customer_reviews.text: The air mattress traveled well. It was used for a week long camping trip. I used an Intex hand pump to inflate it. Once I figured out how the fill / deflate valve worked, it was easy to inflate and deflate. Be sure to inflate it and let it sit for about a day before using it the first time.
customer_reviews.author: beinpositive

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Positives: Fits in 3 person tent (or at least my 3 person tent). Cheap (I paid like $20) Negatives Batteries are listed as D but actually C... I had to purchase an extra set of batteries once I found out... Deflates pretty quickly (refilled once our first night and twice the second night)
customer_reviews.author: Jerad Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put on a sofa bed in an RV. Those beds are hideous and this fits right on top of the mattress, doesn’t take up too much room and makes all the difference in terms of comfort. Stores easily when deflated.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W. Bajan

customer_reviews.title: Full size Intex running to pricey compared to all other sized great to find this one on sale
customer_reviews.text: Love the full size mattress for my back but getting harder to find them at a reasonable price. For some reason they are charging more for the full size. The only draw back is after using for awhile they tend to bubble in a spot then I have to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Ann

customer_reviews.title: Quick comfort
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the price point, this inflatable is well worth the money. Easy to inflate, comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go or as pop out and use works great
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sets up well and feels great easy on the body and tossing and turning. Slept like a baby on this it fit well in our tent on a camping trip just have batteries for the pump and your in business.
customer_reviews.author: Mar J.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but a little too soft for my preference ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product but a little too soft for my preference and i only way 130. with my girlfriend on it as well i find myself slipping and smooshing the side down.we use it for camping. for the price it works well for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: ricetruck91

customer_reviews.title: Started Leaking Air After 1 Use
customer_reviews.text: This mattress worked great....for 1 night. After just 1 night, this mattress started leaking air for no apparent reason. By morning, it was almost flat.
customer_reviews.author: cahb

customer_reviews.title: It takes 6 C Batteries not 5 D Batteries! Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to completely ready the description. While the product is good and served its purpose the conflicting information is what got me. First it says 6 c batteries then below it says " (powered by 4 D-size batteries; not included)" Not a big big deal but this think take 6 C batteries not 4 D!
customer_reviews.author: Breyden Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be re-inflated often, good purchase otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is great but does not hold the air for a long time if two people are sleeping on it. Used it for two weeks though and besides having to reinflate every night it was fine. Gets put together easily and can easily be taken apart. The handheld pump is effective too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice air mattress for a nap, not so good for a long sleep.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold air well. You have to keep reinflating it all night long.
customer_reviews.author: David S. Brumley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this bed for the price of $20! Very happy! I accidentally ordered two and left one at my sister’s for when I visit and it’s actually quite comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Mosciatti

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Of course not the best, but decent for the price. Very durable. Does lose some air during the night but wasn’t that bad. My boyfriend and I both slept on it for 3 nights, both 6’1 and 260 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for...as for me my opinion...good for a minute moment or light weight conditions or emergency for guest
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Waters

customer_reviews.title: The pump needs batteries!
customer_reviews.text: So I didn't realize but luckily I bought a pump that plugs into an outlet a few weeks ago to blow up the kids' pool... but this pump needs like 4 D batteries. Other than that my pool pump got it blown up in about 10 minutes at the most, the velvety top on it is super comfortable and it's really comfortable over all!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this due to the 600 lb limit. See I wanted this for a family outing . If my family shared this, we'd be around 500 lbs and woohoo, we are all set. Not the case. After a couple of uses, the seams popped leaving a large bubble in the center of the bed where if you sat on the bed you rolled right off because the center seam had popped making a mountain in the middle. Also, it stopped holding air consistently as well. I have been told historically that air loss is normal while the mattress gets used to being used, but come on. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without being sealed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived not even taped shut. Wide open. No glue to show it was sealed. No extra box to protect it. No tape anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as any inflatable air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as any inflatable air mattress, why waste money on an expensive one that could pop just as easily? I put a 3 inch memory foam pad on top when camping to make it even better.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Useful. Needs C battery type. 6 of the c type batteries. I like how it comes with a pump and it is very inexpensive
customer_reviews.author: Mann

customer_reviews.title: Get What You Pay For...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a two-day camping trip. When the package arrived we blew up the air bed and laid on it while watching a movie to test it out... deflated before the movie was over. Amazon was quick with a replacement but we had to leave for our trip without testing out the new air bed. By morning there was a VERY notable different in the amount of air in it, while not flat had to keep being re inflated. Also, the pump was over heated quickly in use and caused the batteries to sweat and left condensation inside of it. Not as happy as I expected to be, really a let down.
customer_reviews.author: JadeKiss23

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions and you won't wake up to a ...
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions and you won't wake up to a deflated bed. This came in handy for a camping trip my boyfriend and I took a week ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Might as well just sleep on the floor.. you'll be there quickly anyway....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It arrived the day before my guests arrived, couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived the day before my guests arrived, couldn't get it to inflate even ONE time. I am now in a bind and furious! I demand a refund.
customer_reviews.author: H Larsen

customer_reviews.title: ONCE we got the hang of it it was fine. the battery alignment was hard to see inside ...
customer_reviews.text: ONCE we got the hang of it it was fine. the battery alignment was hard to see inside the pump. overall I though it was comfortable to sleep. it was worth the cost for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Holds Air very well. I'm 270lbs and 6'2" & sleep very well on this mattress multiple consecutive nights. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, even if it was only $20. It's piece of plastic junk! I took it camping and it kept on deflating every hour. I will invest in a better one that will hopefully last me longer. I'll probably use it as camping shoe mat on the outside of the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress but the fan/compressor uses a lot of battery and only works about 10 times before it starts to die out
customer_reviews.author: J Paytall

customer_reviews.title: Get your own pump
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my mattress today. Unfortunately the pump is very poor and I had to get out my manual pump to finish with the inflation. The mattress is what is expected and the proper size to fit in the tent for my kids so...two stars for crappy pump and decent mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Overall, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good mattress, comfortable and durable. The only draw back would have to be the battery operated pump. The pump uses 6 "C" batteries and they are only good for a single mattress inflation.
customer_reviews.author: dawn h.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We were in a jam with house guests and this was a great value for 2 kids to sleep on...little tight for kids but good for one adult.
customer_reviews.author: MDWF

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Take D Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Glad I tried to put the batteries in the pump before I went camping! Description says it takes 4 D batteries but that is wrong. Directions and the pump both say 6 C batteries so don’t go buy D batteries ahead of time for this cause you won’t be able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam N

customer_reviews.title: Air bed
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in the back of my excursion very durable and the included pump is a good unit not problems with it
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing when I go car camping
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing when I go car camping. I just put my suv rear seats down and inflate it in the trunk and sleep confidently in my car. No chances of bugs biting me or coyotes or bears coming close to me!
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Using this mattress while my daughter potty training, has ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this mattress while my daughter potty training, has been inflated and slept on for about 3-4 months and hasn't went flat yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Top quality and easy to deflate and fold.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress so much. It holds air for weeks. Also the quick release to let the air out is genius. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Saleana stevens

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you get what you pay for. It comes with a pump which if bought alone costs as much as this entire package. That being said, the pump does inflate quickly, but is weak and won't fully inflate the mattress. The mattress also will not hold air for more than a few hours. It doesn't completely deflate, but makes it so its very uncomfortable to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C.

customer_reviews.title: When that extra company arrives.
customer_reviews.text: Sleep very well, (So I was told by sleeper) Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Easy to inflate/ deflate, even using my old Coleman pump.
customer_reviews.author: Trena

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Used for a week and still going strong! The mattress was very comfortable and easy to setup. I would recommend this air mattress even if it didn't include a pump as well. Great product for the price! We had no issues with air loss or punctures.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: This was great! It is a thicker material than my old ...
customer_reviews.text: This was great! It is a thicker material than my old one (the old one/different brand that got a hidden leak). After pumping it full of air it stayed full for 4 whole days before it was slightly less full of air, but with the pump that came with the bed it was a quick fix.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Quality airbed.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Came new as advertised. Fast shipping. Blows up fast and stays full for a long camping weekend. Used it 5 days in a row. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Spring

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and an excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and an excellent value! No complaints at all
customer_reviews.author: David Flores

customer_reviews.title: Popped a leak after 2 nights of use
customer_reviews.text: Popped a hole after sleeping on it two nights (used for the first time just after the return window, of course). I took the time to inflate and stretch it before my camping trip, was fine for the first two nights, then day 3 was leaking air and was unusable. Really disappointed in this landfill.
customer_reviews.author: John M Felling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OMG, what a difference. Should of got this years ago. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: 808Hiker60

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Have been using it for the past 5 months straight and its in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Miyuki

customer_reviews.title: Inflates/deflates easily
customer_reviews.text: Inflates/deflates with the pump quickly (given the power of the pump). We've used it for several guest so far and they have said it was comfortable to sleep on. It's also held up to two small boys and their efforts to turn it into a bounce pad when it's inflated when I'm not looking. Definitely easier than turning the couch into a bed for overnight guests!
customer_reviews.author: Christina C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price fool you... this is as good as it gets
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for a friend to use in as RV bed. Asked yesterday was told it was great to sleep on very comfortable and warm. Guess it isn't as tall as other models so less air inside to heat up. Sleeping in 30F weather and they were pleased with it. Those taller airbeds can be darn cold. Great deal using Amazon Prime next day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Yeolla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate. Extremely comfortable and easy to add sheets or liners to. My girlfriend and I were able to fit in with both of our nephews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for what you get, my only complaint is that the air pump takes expensive C batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan M.

customer_reviews.title: Camping trip
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth it, it holds air well enough, and the included pump was a really nice addition to the package. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kim Phan

customer_reviews.title: Inflator is garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a weekend to go camping..skip out on the auto inflator it comes with. It will inflate to about 90 percent, and after that..ur done. Made for a very uncomfortable weekend. Skip this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Chmielewski

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who slept on it for 9 days. Did complain of back pain after about 7 nights. Holds air grea
customer_reviews.author: Mlalte

customer_reviews.title: would not hold up air
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this item for house guests visiting. It comes with a pump which is very handy. Pumped up the mattress the first night. On second night, it deflated and needed to pump again. The air mattress is just cannot hold up the air.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin W.

customer_reviews.title: Awful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This air bed is terrible. Do not waste your money. Straight out of the box, it doesn't hold air. I used it for the first time last night and it slowly leaked the whole night. When I woke I was actually touching the floor....and I only weigh 135 pounds. No idea how they can say the weight limit is 600. I guess it would be fine if you're okay with getting up every hour to re-inflate it. Total piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: melinda wolfeil

customer_reviews.title: My favorite air mattress
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this air mattress is amazing. I use it for festivals and don't usually ever have to put more air in it. It's durable and comfortable and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Does not fully inflate
customer_reviews.text: The pump isn't strong enough to inflate the mattress to a firm level, even with fresh batteries. If you don't mind a slightly floppy bed then this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman Graham

customer_reviews.title: slow leak after 2nd camping trip
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy after the first camping trip. The bed was very comfortable, and no leaks, but the next time out was a different story. Nearly flat to the ground by the morning. I agree with others who have complained about slow leaks that cannot be located. This thing is useless at this point.You are better off buying foam which is what i plan to do.
customer_reviews.author: delZ

customer_reviews.title: Durable and downy
customer_reviews.text: I've used this air mattress indoors for guests and on camping trips. It fills up quickly and stays full. It only takes about 7 fill ups before I have to replace the batteries though. It's easy to clean and folds up flat so it's easy to store. It would be nice if it came with a storage or travel bag but for the price it was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Diane Grabhorn

customer_reviews.title: Received it with a hole in it
customer_reviews.text: I had received it and went to pump it up a day before I left to camping and there was a hole in it! It looks like someone had cut it & i had opened it by peeling off the tape so I know it wasn’t me. Other than that issue it looked like it would have worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect and comfy for the price. So far we have only used it twice so hopefully it is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie B

customer_reviews.title: Great Disposable Air Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This Airbed is great for the first few uses. Then as I found out after buying my second one, they stop holding air. Both of mine failed after a few uses, they leak from the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Mister R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Airbed and Battery Pump
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Battery pump is 10 times better than manual pump.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: It worked once. The second time we tried to ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It worked once. The second time we tried to use it it wouldn't stay inflated through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Weaver

product_meta.title: Intex Prestige Downy Airbed Kit with Hand Held Battery Pump, Full
product_meta.description:
Index Prestige Downy Airbed Kit - Flinted Prestige Downy Airbed Kit Perfect choice for the rugged outdoors. The flocked top gives a more luxurious sleep surface, cleans easily and is waterproof. Includes battery operated pump. Full-sized inflatable mattress perfect for the rugged outdoors, but also handy around the house Soft flocked top provides a luxurious sleeping surface Battery-powered pump (6 C-Cell Battery Pump; not included) 600-pound weight capacity3-in-1 valve with extra-wide opening Measures 54 by 8. 75 by 75 inches (WxHxD)Folds compactly for storage

AMAZON.COM


Great for the rugged outdoors but also handy around the house, the Full-sized Intex Prestige Downy Airbed is waterproof for camping use and its soft flocked top provides a luxurious sleeping surface. The mattress is constructed of a quality-tested, 20.8-gauge waterproof top with 14-gauge vinyl beams and 15-gauge sides and bottom for stability. The bed inflates in minutes thanks to the 3-in-1 valve with extra-wide opening and the portable, battery-powered pump (powered by 6C-size batteries; not included). 

The Prestige Downy Airbed is raised 8.75 inches from the floor, and at 54 by 8.75 by 75 inches (WxHxD) is an official Full-sized bed--ensuring a tight fit for fitted sheets. This bed has a 600-pound weight capacity. It folds compactly for storage, and it comes with a shelf box with carry handle for transport. Spot clean with mild soap and water.
feature_bullets: Full-sized inflatable mattress perfect for the rugged outdoors, but also handy around the house
Soft flocked top provides a luxurious sleeping surface

Measures 54 by 8. 75 by 75 inches (WxHxD); folds compactly for storage Location, temperature, and humidity will affect the firmness of the airbed. Airbeds will need to be occasionally re-inflated (topped off) to maintain desired firmness when used f
Battery-powered pump (powered by 6C-size batteries; not included)
600-pound weight capacity; 3-in-1 valve with extra-wide opening
20 gauge flocked waterproof top with 15 gauge sides
3-in-1 valve has extra wide openings for fast filling and deflating
Battery pump can be used for other inflatables
Conventional mattress size allows for bedding to fit easily
Folds compactly for storage and travel
20 gauge flocked waterproof top with 15 gauge sides
3-in-1 valve has extra wide openings for fast filling and deflating
Battery pump can be used for other inflatables
Conventional mattress size allows for bedding to fit easily
Folds compactly for storage and travel
